body.name: Personalized Note Card & Envelope Stationary Set with Border, Monogram and Full Name, Boxed Stationery Set of Flat Notecards in Choice of Colors | Fairmont & Grove Paper Co.
features: SET SIZE & PRICING The price shown is the base price for a set of 10 note cards + 10 blank envelopes. When you customize your order, you will be prompted to choose your set size from a set of 10 up to a set of 200. As you select your set size, the price will update for that quantity. Adding return address printing on envelopes will also increase the base price.

DESIGN Your note cards will be personalized with the font styling and letter capitalization that's shown in the product images. The note cards can be printed in a choice of 20 ink colors - see the color chart for options. The print on the stationery is flat, crisp and clear.
NOTE CARDS are FLAT A2 and measure 5.5" x 4.25". The cardstock is smooth bright white 110lb premium weight. We do not print any logos on our note cards.

ENVELOPES Choose from 12 envelope colors - see color chart for options. Envelopes are made from premium weight papers and have a deep, pointed flap. Colored envelopes are 91lb, white envelopes are 80lb. Envelopes can be printed with a return address for an additional fee.

PACKAGING & SHIPPING Note cards are packaged in clear lidded boxes, ready for gift giving or storage. Depending on the set size you choose, your stationery may be packaged in multiple boxes. A gift message can be added and this will be included with the order.
body.description: This personalized note card set is great to have on hand to say hello, write a quick thank you note or for everyday correspondence. The classic design with a border and both a monogram and full name suits both men and women. All the stationery is made to order so you can choose your ink color, envelope color and set size to create a custom set. Read on for more product details and if you would like more information before ordering, please get in touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing customer service!!
reviews.reviewText: I made a mistake on my order and added the wrong initials on my persolized cards. Seller responded immediately and sent me the corrected cards right away! The cards are beautiful and very qualitative, highly recommend!
